name: Hegemony Dreadnought
description: Ultimate Hegemony warship. Requires Allied status.

description: Freedom fighter flagship. Requires Allied status.

name: Coalition Runner
description: Fast blockade runner. Good for smuggling.

description: Maximum cargo capacity. Slow but reliable.

name: Frontier Scavenger
description: Salvage specialist. Good armor for size.

description: Cybernetic hybrid warship. Requires Allied status.

description: Exotic alien warship. Requires Allied status.

description: Pirate attack craft. Fast and cheap.

name: Guild Miner
description: Industrial mining ship. Unarmed but tough.
